snippet.title: Cold Abyss: Director's Cut | WORLD PREMIERE trailer at The Horror Game Awards 2024
snippet.description:
How deep will you go? COLD ABYSS is a relaxing and atmospheric exploration game set on the bottom of the ocean. Your objective is simple: repair all broken network cables.

The Director’s Cut version features new levels, an expanded story, and a completely rebuilt movement system. Whether it’s peace you’re looking for, or something else- the dark depths of the ocean are the perfect place to unwind after a long day.

WISHLIST: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3260040/Cold_Abyss_Directors_Cut/

#thehorrorgameawards #HorrorGamesShowcase
---
The Horror Game Awards started towards the end of 2022 as a Horror Game of the Year Award set up by two die hard horror game fans. Fourteen content creators made up that year’s jury. It was such a success that in 2023 the jury doubled in size and the awards expanded their scope.

The aim of the awards is simple: to celebrate horror as one of the best genres in video games and to recognise the year’s greatest horror games alongside the developers who make them.
